patterns: How to take care of my watch?
responses: To care for your watch, avoid water exposure, service it regularly, and store it properly. Use a soft cloth to clean the case and bracelet.
Proper watch care includes avoiding shocks, cleaning with a soft cloth, and servicing it every few years to ensure accuracy.

patterns: What is the price range for luxury watches?

High-end watch prices depend on the brand and materials used. Some luxury watches can cost several thousand dollars.

patterns: What are the latest watch releases?
